name: Husband for an Hour
description:
"Husband for an hour" needs to create a workshop for fulfilling orders for single wives.
the more tools, the more orders. the money earned can be spent on fun entertainment. some workshop items you should find. they are scattered all over the place. there are also items for entertainment.

• 15+ Explorable Locations
• 8 Unique Girls to Encounter
• 60+ Uncensored Scenes
• Deep Reaching Exploration & Choice System
• No DRM
• Windows
